repairedDockerfile:
FROM wordpress:latest
MAINTAINER Kristian Ã˜stergaard Martensen <km@shipbeat.com>

ENV WOOCOMMERCE_VERSION 3.5.1

RUN apt-get update \
    && apt-get install -y --no-install-recommends unzip wget \
    && wget https://downloads.wordpress.org/plugin/woocommerce.$WOOCOMMERCE_VERSION.zip -O /tmp/temp.zip \
    && cd /usr/src/wordpress/wp-content/plugins \
    && unzip /tmp/temp.zip \
    && rm /tmp/temp.zip \
    && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*

# Install the gmp and mcrypt extensions
RUN apt-get update -y
RUN apt-get install --no-install-recommends -y libgmp-dev && rm -rf /var/lib/apt/lists/*;
RUN ln -s /usr/include/x86_64-linux-gnu/gmp.h /usr/local/include/
RUN docker-php-ext-configure gmp
RUN docker-php-ext-install gmp

RUN echo extension=gmp.so > $PHP_INI_DIR/conf.d/gmp.ini

# Download WordPress CLI
RUN curl -f -L "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/wp-cli/builds/gh-pages/phar/wp-cli.phar" > /usr/bin/wp && \
    chmod +x /usr/bin/wp

VOLUME ["/var/www/html"]
